onResult.desc: Call after processing each client's call

client_addr.desc: IPv4:addr, IPv6:addr or other-type:addr, optionally followed by :port or :path

delay.desc: delay response for specific absolute time in microseconds since request was made for _any_ action

act.desc: one of: pass, drop, reject, reauth

onCall.desc: Call before processing each client's call

delay.desc: delay response for specific absolute time in microseconds since request was made

onFail.desc: Call before processing each client's call
